data.text:
@mac_an_ghoill @justin_hart Yes, you got a problem with facts my friend?

Tell me, how are those lockdowns going that fear-monger/panic pusher Justin predicted?
@mac_an_ghoill @justin_hart No such thing as "pro vaccine PR." If you don't like science, just admit it.
@thereal_truther @justin_hart Amazing that with all the pro vaccine PR out there that there is this fixation on the modest counterbalance to that messaging.

@mac_an_ghoill @justin_hart It’s great to reward vaccine companies who indisputably created a product that saved millions. Those who exploited the pandemic for profit & fame by harming others? Special place in hell as I’m sure you agree!
@thereal_truther @justin_hart Yeah man. That was the real grift here. Blogger money. Forget about the billions billions made through the vaccines, tests, masks, apps. We need to talk about blogs.

@thereal_truther @justin_hart Vaccines make lockdowns obsolete. Justin couldn’t see that because it involves believing in the effectiveness of the vaccines  in preventing serious disease in the first place, which makes lockdowns unnecessary
@JimEaglenomask @justin_hart I agree with the first part
